com.cloudera.cdk.data.dao
Interface EntityBatch<K,E>

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseEntityBatch
public interface EntityBatch<K,E>

Method Summary
 void close()
          This closes and finalizes the batch operation, flushing any remaining entities in the buffer.
 void flush()
          Flushes the write buffer, committing any and all entities currently in the buffer.
 void put(K key, E entity)
          Put the entity into the HBase table with K key.
 

Method Detail

put

void put(K key,
         E entity)
Put the entity into the HBase table with K key. Since this is a part of a batch operation, this entity will not be committed to the table until the writeBuffer has reached capacity.

Parameters:
key - The key for this entity
entity - The entity to store

flush

void flush()
Flushes the write buffer, committing any and all entities currently in the buffer.

close

void close()
This closes and finalizes the batch operation, flushing any remaining entities in the buffer.
